item.title: Hanan add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "I don't believe in aging. I believe in forever altering one's aspect to the sun. " -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: Hanan add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "Never let anybody guess that you have a mind of your own. Above all be pure" -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: Hanan add a quote by محمود درويش
item.description: "علموك أن تحذر الفرح؛ لأن خيانته قاسية... من أين يأتيك فجأة!!" -- محمود درويش

item.title: Hanan add a quote by Nikos Kazantzakis
item.description: "I said to the almond tree, 'Sister, speak to me of God.' And the almond tree blossomed." -- Nikos Kazantzakis

item.title: Hanan add a quote by محمود درويش
item.description: "و كن من أنتَ حيث تكون و احمل عبءَ قلبِكَ وحدهُ" -- محمود درويش

item.title: Hanan add a quote by Nikos Kazantzakis
item.description: "يارب ,, لا تنزل على الانسان كل ما يستطيع تحمله " -- Nikos Kazantzakis

item.title: Hanan add a quote by Nikos Kazantzakis
item.description: "God changes his appearance every second. Blessed is the man who can recognize him in all his disguises." -- Nikos Kazantzakis

item.title: Hanan add a quote by Benjamin Franklin
item.description: "Many people die at twenty five and aren't buried until they are seventy five." -- Benjamin Franklin

item.title: Hanan add a quote by ليلى الجهني
item.description: "ليسَ هُناك أجمل ولا أقرب ولا أتعس ، هُناك فقط : حُبنا الذي يمنح الأشياء ملامِحُها وأسمائها وألوانها !" -- ليلى الجهني

item.title: Hanan add a quote by Rodney Dangerfield
item.description: "My wife and I were happy for twenty years. Then we met." -- Rodney Dangerfield

item.title: Hanan add a quote by سوزان عليوان
item.description: "تعثرت بضوئك .. عثرتُ على ظلي " -- سوزان عليوان

item.title: Hanan add a quote by Douglas Coupland
item.description: "We are changed souls; we don't look at things the same way anymore. For there was a time when we expected the worst. But then the worst happened, did it not? And so we will never be surprised again." -- Douglas Coupland

item.title: Hanan add a quote by Zadie Smith
item.description:
"(a) Are the skies you sleep under likely to open up for weeks on end? (b) Is the ground you walk on likely to tremble and split? (c) Is there a chance (and please check the box, no matter how small that chance seems) that the ominous mountain casting a midday shadow over your home might one day erupt with no rhyme or reason?
Because if the answer is yes to one or all of these questions, then the life you lead is a midnight thing, always a hair's breadth from the witching hour; it is volatile, it is threadbare; it is carefree in the true sense of that term; it is light, losable like a key or a hair clip. And it is lethargy: why not sit all morning, all day, all year, under the same cypress tree drawing the figure eight in the dust? More than that, it is disaster, it is <i>chaos:</i> why not overthrow a government on a whim, why not blind the man you hate, why not go mad, go gibbering through the town like a loon, waving your hands, tearing your hair? There's nothing to stop you---or rather <i>anything</i> could stop you, any hour, any minute. <i>That</i> feeling. <i>That's</i> the real difference in a life." -- Zadie Smith

item.title: Hanan add a quote by Douglas Coupland
item.description: "So where do you start when you want to start your life again?" -- Douglas Coupland

item.title: Hanan add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "There is a way to be good again..." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Hanan add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Have you ever been in love? Horrible isn't it? It makes you so vulnerable. It opens your chest and it opens up your heart and it means that someone can get inside you and mess you up. You build up all these defenses, you build up a whole suit of armor, so that nothing can hurt you, then one stupid person, no different from any other stupid person, wanders into your stupid life...You give them a piece of you. They didn't ask for it. They did something dumb one day, like kiss you or smile at you, and then your life isn't your own anymore. Love takes hostages. It gets inside you. It eats you out and leaves you crying in the darkness, so simple a phrase like 'maybe we should be just friends' turns into a glass splinter working its way into your heart. It hurts. Not just in the imagination. Not just in the mind. It's a soul-hurt, a real gets-inside-you-and-rips-you-apart pain. I hate love." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Hanan add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: Hanan add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "Never be bullied into silence. Never allow yourself to be made a victim. Accept no one’s definition of your life; define yourself." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Hanan add a quote by Orhan Pamuk
item.description: "For if a lover's face survives emblazoned on your heart, the world is still your home." -- Orhan Pamuk

item.title: Hanan add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Accept what life offers you and try to drink from every cup. All wines should be tasted; some should only be sipped, but with others, drink the whole bottle." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Hanan add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "I learned that the search for God is a Dark Night, that Faith is a Dark Night. And that’s hardly a surprise really, because for us each day is a dark night. None of us knows what might happen even the next minute, and yet still we go forward. Because we trust. Because we have Faith." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Hanan add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "The night is just a part of the day" -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Hanan add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Every moment in life is an act of faith" -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Hanan add a quote by هاني نقشبندي
item.description: "قل لي ياصديقي الإيطالي ، لماذا يبتسم الناس عند التقاط صور لهم ؟ - لا أعلم . - كي يقنعوا أنفسهم كم كانوا سعداء في الماضي !" -- هاني نقشبندي

item.title: Hanan add a quote by هاني نقشبندي
item.description: "إن الله يخلق الإنسان في منتصف الطريق دائماً. فإما أن يمضي إلى الأمام، أو يبقى حيث تركه الله" -- هاني نقشبندي

item.title: Hanan add a quote by هاني نقشبندي
item.description: "نولد ، نكبر ، نموت، و لا نعرف عن المرأة سوى ثلاثة أشياء : تحيض و لا نحيض. تلد و لا نلد. نخطيء و لا يحق لها الخطأ" -- هاني نقشبندي

item.title: Hanan add a quote by غسان كنفاني
item.description: "لا تمت قبل أن تكون ندّاً" -- غسان كنفاني

item.title: Hanan add a quote by Douglas Coupland
item.description: "Time ticks by; we grow older. Before we know it, too much time has passed and we've missed the chance to have had other people hurt us. To a younger me this sounded like luck; to an older me this sounds like a quiet tragedy." -- Douglas Coupland

item.title: Hanan add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "I've learned that even when I have pains, I don't have to be one." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Hanan add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "I hope she'll be a fool -- that's the best thing a girl can be in this world, a beautiful little fool." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald
